title: Experimental Comparative Study-Based Instructional Design for Federated Learning Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and psychology concepts
context.additional_context: For adolescents exploring careers in medical/legal/technical fields, an experimental process investigating the developmental relationship between sensory systems and associative learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain how developmental stages of sensory systems (visual/auditory) influence associative learning capabilities.
Learners can analyze experimental data to compare learning performance differences based on sensory stimuli.
Learners can discuss scientific rationales for developmental stage-specific learning strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
